translations.literal: How great, the Sage Ancestor establishing the enterprise!
translations.idiomatic: How magnificent was the Sage Ancestor's establishment of the enterprise!

translations.literal: Later heirs received succession, to broaden cherishing relatives.
translations.idiomatic: Later heirs received the succession in order to broaden the practice of cherishing relatives.

sentences.zh: 至于孝武，以諸侯王疆土過制，或替差失軌，而子弟為匹夫，輕重不相準，於是制詔御史：「諸侯王或欲推私恩分子弟邑者，令各條上，朕且臨定其號名。」

translations.literal: By Xiaowu, the feudal lords' territories exceeded regulations, some replaced and deviated from proper conduct, yet sons and younger brothers became commoners, weighty and light were not balanced, therefore imperial edict to the censor: 'Feudal lords who wish to extend private kindness by dividing fiefs to sons and younger brothers, let each submit memorials, I will personally determine their titles and names.'
translations.idiomatic: By Emperor Xiaowu's time, the feudal lords' territories exceeded the regulations, some had been replaced and deviated from proper conduct, yet their sons and younger brothers became mere commoners—the weighty and light were not properly balanced. Therefore, an imperial edict was sent to the censor: 'Feudal lords who wish to extend private kindness by dividing fiefs to their sons and younger brothers should each submit memorials, and I will personally determine their titles and names.'

translations.literal: From this, all branch and younger lines became marquises.
translations.idiomatic: From this time onward, all branch lines and younger sons became marquises.

sentences.zh: 《詩》云「文王孫子，本支百世」，信矣哉！

translations.literal: The Poetry says 'King Wen's grandsons, root and branches for a hundred generations', how true!
translations.idiomatic: As the Poetry says, 'King Wen's grandsons, root and branches for a hundred generations'—how true this is!

cells.idiomatic: Marquis Xin of Geng Xie
Son of the emperor's elder brother.

cells.content: 七年中封，十三年，高后元年，有罪，削爵一級，為關內侯。
cells.literal: Seventh year middle enfeoffed, thirteenth year, Gao Hou first year, had crime, reduced rank one level, became Guan Nei Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the middle of the seventh year; in the thirteenth year, first year of Gao Hou, committed a crime, had rank reduced one level, became Marquis of Guan Nei.
Marquis Xi of He Yang

cells.content: 帝兄，為代王。匈奴攻代，棄國，廢為侯。
cells.literal: Emperor's elder brother, became Dai King. Xiongnu attacked Dai, abandoned state, deposed to marquis.
cells.idiomatic: Emperor's elder brother, became King of Dai. When Xiongnu attacked Dai, he abandoned the state and was deposed to marquis.

cells.content: 八年九月丙午封，七年，孝惠二年薨，以子為王，諡曰頃王。
cells.literal: Eighth year ninth month bing wu enfeoffed, seventh year, Xiao Hui second year passed away, with son as king, posthumous name Qing King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the eighth year, ninth month, bing wu; seventh year, second year of Xiao Hui, passed away; his son became king with posthumous name Qing King.

cells.content: 沛十一年十二月癸巳，侯濞以帝兄子封，十二年，為吳王。
cells.literal: Pei eleventh year twelfth month gui si, Marquis Pi with emperor elder brother son enfeoffed, twelfth year, became Wu King.
cells.idiomatic: In the eleventh year of Pei, twelfth month, gui si: Marquis Pi was enfeoffed as the emperor's elder brother's son; twelfth year, became King of Wu.
Marquis Guang of De Ai

cells.content: 一百二十七十二年十一月庚辰，以兄子封，七年八月薨。
cells.literal: One hundred twenty seventh year eleventh month geng chen, with elder brother son enfeoffed, seventh year eighth month passed away.
cells.idiomatic: In the one hundred and twenty-seventh year, eleventh month, geng chen: enfeoffed as elder brother's son; seventh year, eighth month, passed away.

cells.content: 高后三年，頃侯通嗣，二十四年薨。
cells.literal: Gao Hou third year, Qing Marquis Tong succeeded, twenty-fourth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Third year of Gao Hou: Qing Marquis Tong succeeded; twenty-fourth year, passed away.

cells.content: 孝景六年，康侯齕嗣，二十四年薨。
cells.literal: Xiao Jing sixth year, Kang Marquis Yin succeeded, twenty-fourth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Sixth year of Xiao Jing: Kang Marquis Yin succeeded; twenty-fourth year, passed away.

cells.content: 元鼎四年，侯何嗣。五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuan Ding fourth year, Marquis He succeeded. Fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth year of Yuan Ding: Marquis He succeeded. Fifth year: removed because of tribute gold offense.

cells.content: 泰山元康四年，廣玄孫長安大夫猛，詔復家。
cells.literal: Tai Shan Yuan Kang fourth year, Guang great-great-grandson Chang An grand master Meng, imperial edict restored family.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth year of Yuan Kang in Tai Shan: Guang's great-great-grandson, Grand Master Meng of Chang An, was restored to his family by imperial edict.
Sixth generation

cells.content: 七世元壽二年五月甲子，侯勳以廣玄孫之孫長安公乘紹封，千戶，九年，王莽篡位，絕。
cells.literal: Seventh generation Yuan Shou second year fifth month jia zi, Marquis Xun with Guang great-great-grandson's grandson Chang An public carriage continued enfeoffment, thousand households, ninth year, Wang Mang usurped throne, ended.
cells.idiomatic: Seventh generation: second year of Yuan Shou, fifth month, jia zi: Marquis Xun continued the enfeoffment as Guang's great-great-grandson's grandson and Chang An public carriage holder, with one thousand households; ninth year, Wang Mang usurped the throne, line ended.
Marquis Ba Jun of Guan Gong
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.content: 四年五月甲寅封，二年薨。
cells.literal: Fourth year fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, second year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fourth year, fifth month, jia yin; second year, passed away.

cells.content: 六年，侯戎奴嗣，二十年，孝景三年，反，誅。
cells.literal: Sixth year, Marquis Rong Nu succeeded, twentieth year, Xiao Jing third year, rebelled, executed.
cells.idiomatic: Sixth year: Marquis Rong Nu succeeded; twentieth year, third year of Xiao Jing, rebelled and was executed.

cells.literal: Shi Bing Gong Marquis Dan Guo
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Dan Guo of Shi Bing Gong
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.literal: Fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, eleventh year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, jia yin; eleventh year, passed away.

cells.content: 十五年，侯偃嗣，十年，孝景三年，反，誅。
cells.literal: Fifteenth year, Marquis Yan succeeded, tenth year, Xiao Jing third year, rebelled, executed.
cells.idiomatic: Fifteenth year: Marquis Yan succeeded; tenth year, third year of Xiao Jing, rebelled and was executed.
Marquis Xin Du of Ying Ping
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.literal: Fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, tenth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, jia yin; tenth year, passed away.

cells.content: 十四年，侯廣嗣，十一年，孝景三年，反，誅。
cells.literal: Fourteenth year, Marquis Guang succeeded, eleventh year, Xiao Jing third year, rebelled, executed.
cells.idiomatic: Fourteenth year: Marquis Guang succeeded; eleventh year, third year of Xiao Jing, rebelled and was executed.
Marquis An of Yang Qiu Gong
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.literal: Fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, twelfth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, jia yin; twelfth year, passed away.

cells.content: 十六年，侯偃嗣，十一年，孝景四年，坐出國界，削為司寇。
cells.literal: Sixteenth year, Marquis Yan succeeded, eleventh year, Xiao Jing fourth year, because of leaving state border, reduced to Si Kou.
cells.idiomatic: Sixteenth year: Marquis Yan succeeded; eleventh year, fourth year of Xiao Jing, because of leaving the state border, reduced to Si Kou.
Marquis Jiang Lu of Yang Xu
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.content: 五月甲寅封，十二年，為齊王。
cells.literal: Fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, twelfth year, became Qi King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, jia yin; twelfth year, became King of Qi.
Marquis Pi Guang of Li
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.content: 五月甲寅封，十二年，為濟南王。
cells.literal: Fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, twelfth year, became Ji Nan King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, jia yin; twelfth year, became King of Ji Nan.
Marquis Zhi of An Du
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.content: 五月甲寅封，十二年，為濟北王。
cells.literal: Fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, twelfth year, became Ji Bei King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, jia yin; twelfth year, became King of Ji Bei.
Marquis Ang of Ping Chang
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.content: 五月甲寅封，十二年，為膠西王。
cells.literal: Fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, twelfth year, became Jiao Xi King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, jia yin; twelfth year, became King of Jiao Xi.
Marquis Xian of Wu Cheng
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.content: 五月甲寅封，十二年，為菑川王。
cells.literal: Fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, twelfth year, became Zi Chuan King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, jia yin; twelfth year, became King of Zi Chuan.
Marquis Xiong Qu of Bai Shi
Son of King Dao Hui of Qi.

cells.content: 五月甲寅封，十二年，為膠東王。
cells.literal: Fifth month jia yin enfeoffed, twelfth year, became Jiao Dong King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, jia yin; twelfth year, became King of Jiao Dong.
Marquis An of Fu Ling
Son of King Li of Huai Nan.

cells.content: 八年五月丙午封，八年，為淮南王。
cells.literal: Eighth year fifth month bing wu enfeoffed, eighth year, became Huai Nan King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the eighth year, fifth month, bing wu; eighth year, became King of Huai Nan.
Marquis Bo of An Yang
Son of King Li of Huai Nan.

cells.content: 五月丙午封，八年，為衡山王。
cells.literal: Fifth month bing wu enfeoffed, eighth year, became Heng Shan King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, bing wu; eighth year, became King of Heng Shan.
Marquis Ci of Yang Zhou
Son of King Li of Huai Nan.

cells.content: 五月丙午封，八年，為廬江王。
cells.literal: Fifth month bing wu enfeoffed, eighth year, became Lu Jiang King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, bing wu; eighth year, became King of Lu Jiang.
Ai Marquis Liang of Dong Cheng
Son of King Li of Huai Nan.

cells.content: 五月丙午封，七年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Fifth month bing wu enfeoffed, seventh year passed away, no descendants.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, bing wu; seventh year, passed away with no descendants.
Marquis Li of Ping Lu
Son of King Yuan of Chu.

cells.content: 元年四月乙巳封，三年，為楚王。
cells.literal: First year fourth month yi si enfeoffed, third year, became Chu King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the first year, fourth month, yi si; third year, became King of Chu.
Marquis Fu of Xiu
Son of King Yuan of Chu.

cells.content: 四月乙巳封，三年，以兄子楚王戊反，免。三年，侯富更封紅侯，六年薨，諡曰懿。
cells.literal: Fourth month yi si enfeoffed, third year, because elder brother son Chu King Wu rebelled, removed. Third year, Marquis Fu re-enfeoffed as Hong Marquis, sixth year passed away, posthumous name Yi.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fourth month, yi si; third year, removed because his elder brother's son, King Wu of Chu, rebelled. Third year: Marquis Fu was re-enfeoffed as Marquis of Hong; sixth year, passed away with posthumous name Yi.

cells.literal: Seventh year, Huai Marquis Deng succeeded, first year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Seventh year: Huai Marquis Deng succeeded; first year, passed away.

cells.content: 中元年，敬侯嘉嗣，二十四年薨。
cells.literal: Zhong first year, Jing Marquis Jia succeeded, twenty-fourth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: First year of Zhong: Jing Marquis Jia succeeded; twenty-fourth year, passed away.

cells.content: 元朔四年，哀侯章嗣，一年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Yuan Shuo fourth year, Ai Marquis Zhang succeeded, first year passed away, no descendants.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth year of Yuan Shuo: Ai Marquis Zhang succeeded; first year, passed away with no descendants.
Yi Marquis Sui of Shen You
Son of King Yuan of Chu.

cells.literal: Fourth month yi si enfeoffed, twentieth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fourth month, yi si; twentieth year, passed away.

cells.content: 建元五年，侯受嗣，十八年，元狩五年，坐為宗正聽請，不具宗室，削為司寇。
cells.literal: Jian Yuan fifth year, Marquis Shou succeeded, eighteenth year, Yuan Shou fifth year, because as Zong Zheng heard petition, not complete clan chamber, reduced to Si Kou.
cells.idiomatic: Fifth year of Jian Yuan: Marquis Shou succeeded; eighteenth year, fifth year of Yuan Shou, because as Director of the Imperial Clan he heard petitions but did not complete the clan records, reduced to Si Kou.
Marquis Shi of Wan Qu
Son of King Yuan of Chu.

cells.literal: Fourth month yi si enfeoffed, third year, rebelled, executed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fourth month, yi si; third year, rebelled and was executed.
Jing Marquis Diao of Ji Le
Son of King Yuan of Chu.

cells.content: 三年八月壬子封，十六年薨。
cells.literal: Third year eighth month ren zi enfeoffed, sixteenth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the third year, eighth month, ren zi; sixteenth year, passed away.

cells.content: 建元三年，恭侯應嗣，十五年薨。
cells.literal: Jian Yuan third year, Gong Marquis Ying succeeded, fifteenth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Third year of Jian Yuan: Gong Marquis Ying succeeded; fifteenth year, passed away.

cells.content: 元朔元年，侯慶嗣，十六年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuan Shuo first year, Marquis Qing succeeded, sixteenth year, Yuan Ding fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: First year of Yuan Shuo: Marquis Qing succeeded; sixteenth year, fifth year of Yuan Ding, removed because of tribute gold offense.
Marquis Mai of Cheng Shi
Son of King Xiao of Liang.

cells.content: 中五年五月丁卯封，一年，為梁王。
cells.literal: Zhong fifth year fifth month ding mao enfeoffed, first year, became Liang King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth year of Zhong, fifth month, ding mao; first year, became King of Liang.
Marquis Ming of Huan Yi
Son of King Xiao of Liang.

cells.content: 五月丁卯封，一年，為濟川王。
cells.literal: Fifth month ding mao enfeoffed, first year, became Ji Chuan King.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, ding mao; first year, became King of Ji Chuan.
Marquis Ming of Ci
Son of King Xian of Hejian.

cells.content: 元光五年正月壬子封，四年，元朔三年，坐殺人，自殺。
cells.literal: Yuan Guang fifth year first month ren zi enfeoffed, fourth year, Yuan Shuo third year, because of murder, committed suicide.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth year of Yuan Guang, first month, ren zi; fourth year, third year of Yuan Shuo, because of murder, committed suicide.
Si Marquis Cang of An Cheng
Son of King Ding of Changsha.

cells.content: 六年七月乙巳封，十三年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth year seventh month yi si enfeoffed, thirteenth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year, seventh month, yi si; thirteenth year, passed away.

cells.literal: Yuan Ding first year, Jie Marquis Zi Dang succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: First year of Yuan Ding: Jie Marquis Zi Dang succeeded.

cells.content: 侯壽光嗣，五鳳二年，坐與姊亂，下獄病死。
cells.literal: Marquis Shou Guang succeeded, Wu Feng second year, because of incest with sister, imprisoned died of illness.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Shou Guang succeeded; second year of Wu Feng, because of incest with his sister, imprisoned and died of illness.
Yu Zhang
Marquis Cheng of Yi Chun
Son of King Ding of Changsha.

cells.content: 七月乙巳封，十七年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Seventh month yi si enfeoffed, seventeenth year, Yuan Ding fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the seventh month, yi si; seventeenth year, fifth year of Yuan Ding, removed because of tribute gold offense.
Ai Marquis Dang of Ju Rong
Son of King Ding of Changsha.

cells.content: 七月乙巳封，二年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Seventh month yi si enfeoffed, second year passed away, no descendants.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the seventh month, yi si; second year, passed away with no descendants.
Hui Ji
Marquis Fu of Rong Ling
Son of King Ding of Changsha.

cells.content: 七月乙巳封，十七年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Seventh month yi si enfeoffed, seventeenth year, Yuan Ding fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the seventh month, yi si; seventeenth year, fifth year of Yuan Ding, removed because of tribute gold offense.
Marquis Cheng of Xing Shan
Son of King An of Chu.

cells.content: 後九月壬戌封，十七年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Later ninth month ren xu enfeoffed, seventeenth year, Yuan Ding fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the later ninth month, ren xu; seventeenth year, fifth year of Yuan Ding, removed because of tribute gold offense.

cells.literal: Fu Qiu Jie Marquis Bu Hai
cells.idiomatic: Jie Marquis Bu Hai of Fu Qiu
Son of King An of Chu.

cells.content: 後九月壬戌封，十一年薨。
cells.literal: Later ninth month ren xu enfeoffed, eleventh year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the later ninth month, ren xu; eleventh year, passed away.

cells.content: 元狩五年，侯霸嗣，六年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuan Shou fifth year, Marquis Ba succeeded, sixth year, Yuan Ding fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: Fifth year of Yuan Shou: Marquis Ba succeeded; sixth year, fifth year of Yuan Ding, removed because of tribute gold offense.
Pei
Jie Marquis Jiang of Guang Qi
Son of King Gong of Lu.

cells.content: 元朔元年十月丁酉封，薨。
cells.literal: Yuan Shuo first year tenth month ding you enfeoffed, passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the first year of Yuan Shuo, tenth month, ding you; passed away.

cells.content: 侯始嗣，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Marquis Shi succeeded, Yuan Ding fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Shi succeeded; fifth year of Yuan Ding, removed because of tribute gold offense.
Ai Marquis Gan of Dan Yang
Son of King Yi of Jiang Du.

cells.content: 十二月甲辰封，六年，元狩元年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Twelfth month jia chen enfeoffed, sixth year, Yuan Shou first year passed away, no descendants.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the twelfth month, jia chen; sixth year, first year of Yuan Shou, passed away with no descendants.
Wu Hu
Marquis Meng Zhi of Xu Tai
Son of King Yi of Jiang Du.

cells.content: 十二月甲辰封，十六年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Twelfth month jia chen enfeoffed, sixteenth year, Yuan Ding fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the twelfth month, jia chen; sixteenth year, fifth year of Yuan Ding, removed because of tribute gold offense.

cells.literal: Hu Shu Qing Marquis Xu Xing
cells.idiomatic: Qing Marquis Xu Xing of Hu Shu
Son of King Yi of Jiang Du.

cells.literal: First month ding mao enfeoffed, sixteenth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the first month, ding mao; sixteenth year, passed away.

cells.content: 元鼎五年，侯聖嗣，坐知人脫亡名數，以為保，殺人，免。
cells.literal: Yuan Ding fifth year, Marquis Sheng succeeded, because of knowing person escaped registered number, served as guarantor, killed person, removed.
cells.idiomatic: Fifth year of Yuan Ding: Marquis Sheng succeeded; because he knew a person escaped the registered census, served as guarantor, killed someone, and was removed.
Dan Yang
Zhong Marquis [unknown] of Mo Ling
Son of King Yi of Jiang Du.

cells.content: 正月丁卯封，元鼎四年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: First month ding mao enfeoffed, Yuan Ding fourth year passed away, no descendants.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the first month, ding mao; fourth year of Yuan Ding, passed away with no descendants.
Marquis Ding Guo of Huai Ling
Son of King Yi of Jiang Du.

cells.content: 正月丁卯封，十六年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: First month ding mao enfeoffed, sixteenth year, Yuan Ding fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the first month, ding mao; sixteenth year, fifth year of Yuan Ding, removed because of tribute gold offense.
Huai Ling
Ai Marquis Ren of Zhang Liang
Son of King Gong of Liang.

cells.content: 二年五月乙巳封，十三年薨。
cells.literal: Second year fifth month yi si enfeoffed, thirteenth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the second year, fifth month, yi si; thirteenth year, passed away.

cells.content: 元鼎三年，侯順嗣，二十三年，征和三年，為奴所殺。
cells.literal: Yuan Ding third year, Marquis Shun succeeded, twenty-third year, Zheng He third year, killed by slave.
cells.idiomatic: Third year of Yuan Ding: Marquis Shun succeeded; twenty-third year, third year of Zheng He, killed by his slave.
Marquis Dai of Long Qiu
Son of King Yi of Zi Chuan.

cells.content: 五月乙巳封，十五年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Fifth month yi si enfeoffed, fifteenth year, Yuan Ding fifth year, because of tribute gold removed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, yi si; fifteenth year, fifth year of Yuan Ding, removed because of tribute gold offense.
Lang Ya
Marquis Cuo of Ju Yuan
Son of King Yi of Zi Chuan.

cells.literal: Fifth month yi si enfeoffed, seventeenth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, yi si; seventeenth year, passed away.

cells.literal: Yuan Ding second year, Xiao Marquis Guang Chang succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: Second year of Yuan Ding: Xiao Marquis Guang Chang succeeded.
Dai Marquis Gu succeeded.
Zhi Marquis Ji succeeded.
Jie Marquis Xiao succeeded.

cells.literal: Huai Chang Yi Marquis Gao Sui
cells.idiomatic: Yi Marquis Gao Sui of Huai Chang
Son of King Yi of Zi Chuan.

cells.literal: Fifth month yi si enfeoffed, second year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, yi si; second year, passed away.

cells.idiomatic: Fourth year: Hu Marquis Yan Nian succeeded.

Marquis Ke Zhi succeeded.
Yi Marquis Shang of Ping Wang
Son of King Yi of Zi Chuan.

cells.literal: Fifth year yi si enfeoffed, seventh year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth year, yi si; seventh year, passed away.

cells.literal: Yuan Shou third year, Yuan Marquis Chu Ren succeeded, twenty-sixth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Third year of Yuan Shou: Yuan Marquis Chu Ren succeeded; twenty-sixth year, passed away.

cells.content: 太始三年，敬侯光嗣，十四年薨。
cells.literal: Tai Shi third year, Jing Marquis Guang succeeded, fourteenth year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Third year of Tai Shi: Jing Marquis Guang succeeded; fourteenth year, passed away.

cells.literal: Shen Jue fourth year, Qing Marquis Qi succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth year of Shen Jue: Qing Marquis Qi succeeded.
Xiao Marquis Jun succeeded.

cells.literal: Lin Zhong Jing Marquis Shi Chang
cells.idiomatic: Jing Marquis Shi Chang of Lin Zhong
Son of King Yi of Zi Chuan.

cells.content: 五月乙巳封，三十一年薨。
cells.literal: Fifth month yi si enfeoffed, thirty-first year passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the fifth month, yi si; thirty-first year, passed away.
